languages.text: Почтенный историк зодчества Гордей Скатов много лет путешествовал с Вольным Торговцем. Его монументальный цикл об искусстве возведения пустотных станций, — "Вера и практичность в когтях Бездны", — занял место на книжных полков всех книгочеев Простора.

Gordei Skatov, an esteemed historian of architecture, travelled with the Rogue Trader for many years. His magisterial series on the art of void station construction, "Faith and Function in the Claws of the Abyss," found its rightful place on the bookshelves of every bibliophile in the Expanse.
languages.original_text: Почтенный историк зодчества Гордей Скатов много лет путешествовал с Вольным Торговцем. Его монументальный цикл об искусстве возведения пустотных станций, — "Вера и практичность в когтях Бездны", — занял место на книжных полков всех книгочеев Простора.

His monumental series about the art of void station building, Faith and Function in the Claws of the Abyss, found its rightful place on the bookshelves of all bibliophiles in the Expanse.

Gordei Skatov, an esteemed historian of architecture, travelled with the Rogue Trader for many years. His magisterial series on the art of void-station construction, "Faith and Function in the Claws of the Abyss," found its rightful place on the bookshelves of every bibliophile in the Expanse.

Gordei Skatov, an esteemed historian of architecture, travelled with the Rogue Trader for many years. His magisterial series on the art of void-station construction, "Faith and Function in the Claws of the Abyss," found its rightful place on the bookshelves of every bibliophile in the Expanse.

languages.text: 戈尔代·斯卡托夫，这位值得尊敬的建筑历史学家跟随行商浪人旅行很多年。他写下了关于星站建筑艺术的不朽著作《深渊之爪中的信仰与实用功能》，在科罗努斯扩区里每位藏书家的书架上都有一席之地。
languages.original_text: Gordei Skatov, an esteemed historian of architecture, travelled with the Rogue Trader for many years. His magisterial series on the art of void-station construction, "Faith and Function in the Claws of the Abyss," found its rightful place on the bookshelves of every bibliophile in the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: 戈尔代·斯卡托夫，这位值得尊敬的建筑历史学家跟随行商浪人旅行很多年。他写下了关于星站建筑艺术的不朽著作《深渊之爪中的信仰与实用功能》，在科罗努斯扩区里每位藏书家的书架上都有一席之地。

languages.text: Gordei Skatov, ein angesehener Architekturhistoriker, reiste viele Jahre lang an der Seite {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}. Seine Reihe über die Kunst der Raumstationsarchitektur, "Glaube und Funktion in den Klauen des Abgrunds", wurde zum Standardwerk und fand ihren rechtmäßigen Platz im Bücherregal eines jeden bibliophilen Bewohners der Ausdehnung.
languages.original_text: Gordei Skatov, an esteemed historian of architecture, travelled with the Rogue Trader for many years. His magisterial series on the art of void-station construction, "Faith and Function in the Claws of the Abyss," found its rightful place on the bookshelves of every bibliophile in the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: Gordei Skatov, ein ehrenwerter Architekturhistoriker, reiste viele Jahre lang an der Seite {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}. Seine monumentale Serie über die Kunst der Raumstationsarchitektur, Glaube und Funktion in den Klauen des Abgrunds, fand ihren rechtmäßigen Platz im Bücherregal eines jeden bibliophilen Bewohners der Ausdehnung.

languages.text: Gordei Skatov, respectable historien en architecture de son état, voyagea aux côtés {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} de nombreuses années durant. Sa série d'ouvrages magistraux portant sur l'art de la construction des stations spatiales, intitulée « La Foi et la fonction dans les griffes des abysses », trouva bien vite sa place sur les étagères de tous les bibliophiles des Étendues.
languages.original_text: Gordei Skatov, an esteemed historian of architecture, travelled with the Rogue Trader for many years. His magisterial series on the art of void station construction, "Faith and Function in the Claws of the Abyss," found its rightful place on the bookshelves of every bibliophile in the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: Gordei Skatov, un honorable historien en architecture, voyagea aux côtés {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} durant de nombreuses années. « Sa série d’ouvrages monumentaux portant sur l'art de la construction des stations spatiales, intitulée « La Foi et la fonction dans les griffes des abysses », trouva bien vite sa place sur les étagères de tous les bibliophiles des Étendues.

languages.text: Gordei Skatov, un estimado historiador arquitectónico, acompañó a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente durante muchos años. Su serie magistral sobre el arte de la construcción de estaciones del vacío, «Fe y función en las garras del abismo», se abrió paso hasta las estanterías de todos los bibliófilos de la Extensión.
languages.original_text: Gordei Skatov, an esteemed historian of architecture, travelled with the Rogue Trader for many years. His magisterial series on the art of void-station construction, "Faith and Function in the Claws of the Abyss," found its rightful place on the bookshelves of every bibliophile in the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: Gordei Skatov, un honorable historiador arquitectónico, acompañó a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente durante muchos años. Su serie monumental sobre el arte de la construcción de estaciones del vacío, «Fe y función en las garras del abismo», se abrió paso hasta las estanterías de todos los bibliófilos de la Extensión.

languages.text: 著名な建築歴史学者のゴーディ・スカトフは、自由開拓者と何年も旅をした。彼が著したヴォイドステーションの建築様式にまつわる傑作と名高い連作『深淵の魔手に見る信仰と機能』は、その価値が正しく認められ、エクスパンスの蔵書家にとって必携の一冊になった。
languages.original_text: Gordei Skatov, an esteemed historian of architecture, travelled with the Rogue Trader for many years. His magisterial series on the art of void-station construction, "Faith and Function in the Claws of the Abyss," found its rightful place on the bookshelves of every bibliophile in the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: 高名な建築歴史学者のゴーディ・スカトフは、ローグトレーダーと何年も旅をした。彼が著したヴォイドステーションの建築様式にまつわる膨大な連作『深淵の魔手に見る信仰と機能』は、その価値が正しく認められ、エクスパンスの蔵書家にとって必携の一冊になった。

languages.text: Saygıdeğer bir tarihçi ve mimar olan Gordei Skatov yıllar boyunca Hür Tacir'le birlikte yolculuk etti. Uçsuz istasyonu inşası sanatı üzerine ustaca kaleme aldığı serisi "Hiçliğin Pençelerinde İnanç ve Fonksiyon", Enginlik'in tüm kitap koleksiyoncularının rafındaki haklı yerini aldı.
languages.original_text: Gordei Skatov, an esteemed historian of architecture, travelled with the Rogue Trader for many years. His magisterial series on the art of void station construction, "Faith and Function in the Claws of the Abyss," found its rightful place on the bookshelves of every bibliophile in the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: Saygıdeğer bir tarihçi ve mimar olan Gordei Skatov yıllar boyunca Hür Tacir'le birlikte yolculuk etti. Uçsuz istasyonu inşası sanatı üzerine ustaca kaleme aldığı serisi "Hiçliğin Pençelerinde İnanç ve Fonksiyon", Enginlik'in tüm kitap koleksiyoncularının rafındaki haklı yerini aldı.
